SEARCH
Package sh.brane.rpc.internal

Class RpcInvoker

java.lang.Object
sh.brane.rpc.internal.RpcInvoker
@InternalApi public final class RpcInvoker extends Object
Internal helper for invoking JSON-RPC methods with standardized null handling.

This class encapsulates the common pattern of sending RPC requests and handling null results. It provides three strategies for null handling:

  • call(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>) - throws RpcException if result is null
  • callNullable(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>) - returns null if result is null
  • callWithDefault(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>, T) - returns a default value if result is null

Internal Use Only: This class is not part of the public API. It exists to reduce code duplication in RPC client implementations.

Since:
0.1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • RpcInvoker

      public RpcInvoker(RpcInvoker.RpcSender sender, Runnable ensureOpen)
      Creates a new RpcInvoker with the specified sender and connection checker.
      Parameters:
      sender - the RPC sender for making requests
      ensureOpen - a runnable that throws if the connection is closed

  • Method Details

    • call

      public <T> T call(String method, List<?> params, Function<String,T> decoder)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the result, throwing if null.

      This method is appropriate for RPC calls where a null result indicates an error condition (e.g., eth_chainId, eth_getBalance).

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the result string into the target type
      Returns:
      the decoded result
      Throws:
      RpcException - if the result is null

    • callNullable

      public <T> @Nullable T callNullable(String method, List<?> params, Function<String,T> decoder)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the result, returning null if the result is null.

      This method is appropriate for RPC calls where a null result is valid (e.g., eth_getTransactionByHash for non-existent transactions).

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the result string into the target type
      Returns:
      the decoded result, or null if the result is null

    • callWithDefault

      public <T> T callWithDefault(String method, List<?> params, Function<String,T> decoder, T defaultValue)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the result, returning a default value if null.

      This method is appropriate for RPC calls where a null result should be replaced with a sensible default (e.g., eth_getCode returning empty hex).

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the result string into the target type
      defaultValue - the value to return if the result is null
      Returns:
      the decoded result, or the default value if the result is null

    • callObject

      public <T> T callObject(String method, List<?> params, Function<Object,T> decoder)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the raw result object, throwing if null.

      This method is similar to call(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>) but passes the raw result object to the decoder instead of converting to string first. Use this for RPC calls that return complex JSON objects (e.g., eth_getLogs).

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the raw result object into the target type
      Returns:
      the decoded result
      Throws:
      RpcException - if the result is null

    • callNullableObject

      public <T> @Nullable T callNullableObject(String method, List<?> params, Function<Object,T> decoder)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the raw result object, returning null if the result is null.

      This method is similar to callNullable(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>) but passes the raw result object to the decoder instead of converting to string first. Use this for RPC calls that return complex JSON objects where null is valid (e.g., eth_getTransactionByHash).

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the raw result object into the target type
      Returns:
      the decoded result, or null if the result is null

    • callObjectWithDefault

      public <T> T callObjectWithDefault(String method, List<?> params, Function<Object,T> decoder, T defaultValue)
      Invokes an RPC method and decodes the raw result object, returning a default value if null.

      This method is similar to callWithDefault(java.lang.String, java.util.List<?>, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String, T>, T) but passes the raw result object to the decoder instead of converting to string first. Use this for RPC calls that return complex JSON objects where null should map to a default value.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type
      Parameters:
      method - the RPC method name
      params - the method parameters
      decoder - a function to decode the raw result object into the target type
      defaultValue - the value to return if the result is null
      Returns:
      the decoded result, or the default value if the result is null
